md:
giải nghĩa từ "lock" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Lock (noun) - Khóa
	+ Meaning: A device for securing a door, lid, or container, typically operated by a key or combination.
	+ Example sentence: "She locked the door behind her."
	+ Related words: key, unlock, secure, fasten
	+ Antonyms: open, unlock

* Lock (verb) - Khóa lại
	+ Meaning: To fasten or secure something with a lock.
	+ Example sentence: "He locked the car door to prevent theft."
	+ Related words: secure, fasten, close, shut
	+ Antonyms: unlock, open, release

* Lock (verb) - Đóng lại
	+ Meaning: To become fixed or stuck in a particular position or state.
	+ Example sentence: "The gears locked into place, allowing the machine to function smoothly."
	+ Related words: jam, stick, fix, freeze
	+ Antonyms: unlock, release, loosen

* Lock (noun) - Điểm khóa
	+ Meaning: A section of a canal or waterway closed off with gates, used for raising or lowering boats.
	+ Example sentence: "The boat navigated through the lock to reach the next level of the canal."
	+ Related words: canal, waterway, gate, dam
	+ Antonyms: none

* Lock (verb) - Đặt vào vị trí
	+ Meaning: To put something into a fixed or secure position.
	+ Example sentence: "She locked the camera into place on the tripod."
	+ Related words: secure, fasten, fix, position
	+ Antonyms: unlock, release, remove
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lock" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Lock (noun) - Khóa

    • Meaning: A device for securing a door, lid, or container, typically operated by a key or combination.
    • Example sentence: "She locked the door behind her."
    • Related words: key, unlock, secure, fasten
    • Antonyms: open, unlock

  • Lock (verb) - Khóa lại

    • Meaning: To fasten or secure something with a lock.
    • Example sentence: "He locked the car door to prevent theft."
    • Related words: secure, fasten, close, shut
    • Antonyms: unlock, open, release

  • Lock (verb) - Đóng lại

    • Meaning: To become fixed or stuck in a particular position or state.
    • Example sentence: "The gears locked into place, allowing the machine to function smoothly."
    • Related words: jam, stick, fix, freeze
    • Antonyms: unlock, release, loosen

  • Lock (noun) - Điểm khóa

    • Meaning: A section of a canal or waterway closed off with gates, used for raising or lowering boats.
    • Example sentence: "The boat navigated through the lock to reach the next level of the canal."
    • Related words: canal, waterway, gate, dam
    • Antonyms: none

  • Lock (verb) - Đặt vào vị trí

    • Meaning: To put something into a fixed or secure position.
    • Example sentence: "She locked the camera into place on the tripod."
    • Related words: secure, fasten, fix, position
    • Antonyms: unlock, release, remove
